alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 2:49AM PST until January 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The southern end of the Rogue Valley as well as the Cascade Foothills. This includes Interstate 5 from Siskiyou Summit to Medford and portions of Highway 140. This also includes the cities of Medford, Ashland, Phoenix, and Talent. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
